name: Under your Spell Card game
description:
Hello! 
This game that will never be realized is a card game,

you will control, Buerak, an apostle of chaos, who lost an eye in a bet, he is try to get enough souls to buy another Eye.

But again, this game will neve be realized, it's part of the  Game Mockup Jam

Credits:

Pixel Artist Character - Atari Boy 
Pixel Artist  Background - Atari Boy
